TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Abnormal cells are found in the lining of the hypopharynx. These abnormal cells may become cancer and spread into nearby normal tissue.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage 0 hypopharyngeal carcinoma in situ"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "carcinoma de la hipofaringe in situ, estadio 0"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: carcinoma de la hipofaringe in situ, estadio 0

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Se encuentran células anormales en el revestimiento de la hipofaringe. Estas células anormales se pueden volver cancerosas y diseminarse al tejido normal cercano.
